story.narrative: In order to As a user I want to login
story.name: UserLogin.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:user login from main page Given I am at Main Page And I am logged out When Fill login field 'usefOne' and password field '1' and click Login Button Then I am logged in 'usefOne'. I see user menu and avatar holder
Scenario:user login from static login page Given static login page opened When fill login field with 'login' password field 'password' and clock Login Then I am logged in. I see user menu and avatar holder
